channel.title: üè¢ Technical University of Munich on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Technical University of Munich on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Coherent 3D Scene Diffusion From a Single RGB Image
item.description: Coherent 3D scenes are diffused from a single RGB image using a novel image-conditioned 3D scene diffusion model, surpassing state-of-the-art methods.

item.title: Diffusion-based Curriculum Reinforcement Learning
item.description: DiCuRL uses diffusion models to generate challenging yet achievable RL training curricula, outperforming nine state-of-the-art methods.

item.title: Drift-Resilient TabPFN: In-Context Learning Temporal Distribution Shifts on Tabular Data
item.description: Drift-Resilient TabPFN masters temporal data shifts!

item.title: Energy-based Epistemic Uncertainty for Graph Neural Networks
item.description: GEBM: a novel graph-based energy model for robust GNN uncertainty estimation.

item.title: Excluding the Irrelevant: Focusing Reinforcement Learning through Continuous Action Masking
item.description: Boost RL efficiency in continuous action spaces by masking irrelevant actions using three novel continuous action masking methods!

item.title: MotionTTT: 2D Test-Time-Training Motion Estimation for 3D Motion Corrected MRI
item.description: MotionTTT: Deep learning enables accurate 3D motion-corrected MRI by cleverly estimating motion parameters during test-time training, significantly improving image reconstruction.

item.title: Neural Pfaffians: Solving Many Many-Electron Schr√∂dinger Equations
item.description: Neural Pfaffians revolutionize many-electron Schr√∂dinger equation solutions by using fully learnable neural wave functions based on Pfaffians, achieving unprecedented accuracy and generalizability acr…

item.title: ReNO: Enhancing One-step Text-to-Image Models through Reward-based Noise Optimization
item.description: ReNO: Boost one-step text-to-image models by cleverly optimizing initial noise using reward signals, achieving state-of-the-art results efficiently.

item.title: Soft Prompt Threats: Attacking Safety Alignment and Unlearning in Open-Source LLMs through the Embedding Space
item.description: Open-source LLMs are vulnerable to embedding space attacks, which efficiently bypass safety mechanisms and enable data extraction, even after unlearning.

item.title: Spatio-Spectral Graph Neural Networks
item.description: Spatio-Spectral GNNs synergistically combine spatial and spectral graph filters for efficient, global information propagation, overcoming limitations of existing methods.

item.title: Targeted Sequential Indirect Experiment Design
item.description: Adaptive experiment design optimizes indirect experiments in complex systems by sequentially narrowing the gap between upper and lower bounds on a targeted query, providing more efficient and informat…

item.title: Unified Mechanism-Specific Amplification by Subsampling and Group Privacy Amplification
item.description: This paper presents a novel framework for achieving tighter differential privacy guarantees via mechanism-specific amplification using subsampling.
